alert.note: Alert for East Becker; East Otter Tail; West Becker; West Otter Tail (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 6:36PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Otter Tail and southwestern Becker Counties through 715 PM CDT... At 635 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Westbury, or 8 miles north of Detroit Lakes, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Detroit Lakes, Frazee, Vergas, Callaway, Shoreham, Richwood and Rochert. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Becker; East Otter Tail; West Becker; West Otter Tail
